snippet: Lamar Odom, a former N.B.A. star and reality television personality, was on life support Wednesday at a Las Vegas hospital, with his estranged wife, Khloe Kardashian, by his side.
abstract: Former NBA star Lamar Odom remains hospitalized on life support in Las Vegas after being found unconscious at brothel; had reportedly been using cocaine and sexual performance enhancing drugs; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Lamar Odom, a former N.B.A. star and reality television personality, was on life support Wednesday at a Las Vegas hospital, with his estranged wife, Khloe Kardashian, by his side.
